text.section: The department, with advice from the Electrical Advisory Committee, shall select and approve an examination to be used in determining the competency of persons to be licensed under KRS 227A.010 to 227A.140. Examinations selected and approved for each level of licensing shall be nationally recognized examinations which have been determined through proper validation techniques to measure successfully an individual's competency to perform the licensed practice.

The department shall offer the examinations on a regularly scheduled basis in localities determined by the committee. The department shall offer the examinations through any authorized local licensing program.
The department may contract with an outside entity or testing service for the administration of examinations required for licensure.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 435, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 9, effective June 24, 2003.
